這堂課能學習很多國際事務和問題。建議有優秀的英文聽力再修這堂課。
Prof.Stanton is a great teacher, I'm honored to be in your class
This course is very professional and enlightening. Thank you for sharing so much knowledge and give me the chance to rethink about some issues. Thank you!

This course is truly amazing and the required reading materials are fascinating too. 

(however, I actually think 舜文大講堂 is not the best place for this course, as professor's voice cannot be properly heard because of the size of the room)
這堂課我很喜歡的原因就是因為特別能訓練跳脫框架思考的能力，就是真的有動腦思考的感覺，而且在授課內容上，會隨著時事調整及學內容，學習到特別多東西。
I've learned a lot from this course!! Thank you, professor!!
課程主題非常多元，涵蓋全球各大洲的政治議題，教授講課也非常認真，內容相當深入。
助教很喜歡發表意見，蠻有趣的。
